name: Icewall
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create nine 10 foot cubes of ice and place them in any unoccupied space within range. Each cube must be adjacent to at least one other cube. Each cube has AC 10 and 30 hit points and vulnerability to fire.

You can cast this spell before you finish paying the full AP cost. You instead create a number of cubes equal to the AP you paid.
empower: You can carve the cubes as you create them to make shapes, such as stairs or a sculpture.
